padding.desc: Applies a default responsive page padding
padding.desc_cn: 应用默认的响应页面填充

style-fn.desc: Override default CSS style applied to the component (sets minHeight); Function(offset: Number) => CSS props/value: Object; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

height.desc: Value in pixels of container height (if containerized) or window height otherwise
height.desc_cn: 以像素表示的容器高度值（如果是容器化的）或窗口高度值

returns.desc: Object with CSS properties to apply to Page DOM element
returns.desc_cn: 对象的CSS属性应用于页面DOM元素

style-fn.desc_cn: 覆盖应用于组件的默认CSS样式（设置最小高度）；函数（offset:Number）=>CSS props/value:Object；为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围中引用它，而不要内联定义它

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
